channel.title: Astoria on Table41NYC
channel.description: Recent content in Astoria on Table41NYC

item.title: Favela Grill
item.description: Had the churrasco here, and it was pretty good. The chicken and sausage was good. Make sure the steak is ordered medium rare. We ordered medium, and it came out borderline medium well. The caipirinha was really good too. Get the passion fruit and guava. Avoid the kiwi.

item.title: Tamashii Ramen
item.description: Decent ramen noodles. Soup was a little salty. The egg was disappointing.
